cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on December 1, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2685, Understanding Cybersecurity of Mobile Networks Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. ESHOO:
H.R. 2685.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clauses 3 and 18 of Section 8 of Article I of the U.S.
[Page H1999]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Understanding Cybersecurity of Mobile Networks Act
